personalInfo.education: University of Notre Dame (Film, Television, Theater)

tourBios.curYearHigh: He earned fully exempt status for the season after tying for fourth at the Second Global Qualifying Tournament in Kunming. Was 1-over through 36 holes then rebounded with a 3-under weekend to tie with Callum Tarren, Do Eun An and Geon Ha Kim.

tourBios.curYrHigh: He earned fully exempt status for the season after tying for fourth at the Second Global Qualifying Tournament in Kunming. Was 1-over through 36 holes then rebounded with a 3-under weekend to tie with Callum Tarren, Do Eun An and Geon Ha Kim.

He earned fully exempt status for the season after tying for fourth at the Second Global Qualifying Tournament in Kunming. Was 1-over through 36 holes then rebounded with a 3-under weekend to tie with Callum Tarren, Do Eun An and Geon Ha Kim.
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Made his PGA TOUR debut at the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open in Las Vegas, where he missed the cut. Made University of Notre Dame history, becoming the firs player in modern program history to play in a PGA TOUR event. 

2013: Missed the cut in both of his PGA TOUR Canada starts. 

2011: Made five Canadian Tour starts for a second consecutive season, with two made cuts. Finished T34 at the Syncrude Boreal Open.

2010: Five Canadian Tour starts led to two made cutsâa T24 at the season-ending Canadian TOUR Championship, thanks to a final-round 67. 

2009: Played on Web.com Tour tournament, the Chitimacha Louisiana Open.

2007: Made his Web.com Tour debut in Minnesota, at the Showdown at Somerby. Missed the cut.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Played collegiate golf at the University of Notre Dame, graduating in 2006. Earned All-Big East Conference honors in 2003, 2005 and 2006. Was the 2005 Big East Player of the Year and was the medalist at the Big East Conference Championship. ..At the 2006 Big East Championship, finished T5.

tourBios.curYearHigh: He earned fully exempt status for the season after tying for fourth at the Second Global Qualifying Tournament in Kunming. Was 1-over through 36 holes then rebounded with a 3-under weekend to tie with Callum Tarren, Do Eun An and Geon Ha Kim.
